ValidationRule.description: If either of the check boxes are selected on the contact drug object, then restrict the CPA Enrollment Status picklist to be only "Not on File".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Copay_Enrollment_Status__c, "Not on File")), OR(Member_Ineligible_for_CPA__c, No_longer_taking_med__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CPA Enrollment Status needs to be "Not on File"
